messages.verificationIntro: We’ll send you a verification code.
messages.codeInvalid: The code you entered is invalid. Try again.

legal.ageRequirement: Pay and accept money from friends and businesses, emoji and comments encouraged. Must be at least 18 years old.
legal.identityVerification: Your information helps us verify your identity and comply with federal requirements.
legal.acceptance: Please review and accept Venmo’s User Agreement and Privacy Policy before continuing.
legal.smsConsent: By tapping Next, you confirm your number and agree to receive a verification code. Carrier fees may apply.
